dashboardPage.title: Your Reflection Space
dashboardPage.welcome: Hello there. Let's take a moment for you.

tasks.shareInformation: Share your information with a trusted adult

dashboardPage.freeNotesDescription: Add a note about your day. Each note is saved as a separate entry.
dashboardPage.freeNotesPlaceholder: Jot down your thoughts... These notes will be used by the AI companion to understand your mood and customize your plan.

subMoodSheet.title: Mood Logged!
subMoodSheet.description: You're feeling '{mood}'. You can optionally add more detail below or skip.
subMoodSheet.saveSuccessDescription: Your mood of '{primaryMood}' has been logged.

journalPage.title: Journal History
journalPage.description: Review your past moods and notes.
journalPage.noEntries: You have no entries yet. Log a mood or add a note from the dashboard.
journalPage.noNote: No note was written for this day.

deleteDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this journal entry.

insightsPage.title: AI Insights
insightsPage.description: Personalized insights based on your data will be displayed here.

specialistsPage.title: Specialist Referrals
specialistsPage.description: Relevant specialists will be suggested based on your needs.

accessLevel.title: Access Level
accessLevel.sheetDescription: Select the access level you want to request and provide the required documentation.

errors.documentsRequired: Document upload is required for this role.

requirements.educational_institute_admin: Requires establishment documentation and legal permissions.
requirements.clinic_admin: Requires establishment documentation and legal permissions.
requirements.psychologist: Requires educational degree and certified license.

invitationOnly.title: Invitation-Only Roles:
invitationOnly.student: Student: By invitation from an Educational Institute Admin only.
invitationOnly.instructor: Educational Institute Instructor: By invitation from an Educational Institute Admin only.

accessLevel.responseTime: Please note: Your request will be reviewed and we will respond within 7 working days.
accessLevel.requestSuccessDescription: Your request has been received. We will get back to you soon.

signupPage.title: Create Your Account
signupPage.signupSuccessDescription: Your account has been created. Redirecting to login...

signupStepper.errorMandatoryTerms: You must accept the mandatory terms to continue.
signupStepper.registrationCompleteMessage: Your account has been successfully created. Redirecting to dashboard...

stepInformation.title: Welcome to Hami Registration!
stepInformation.mainContent: We are going to ask you a few questions to customize your experience. These are professionally crafted questions based on the latest psychology insights to help us tailor Hami for you.

stepTerms.title: Terms and Consent
stepTerms.description: Please review and accept the following terms.
stepTerms.mandatoryTermsLabel: I accept the Terms and Conditions of use for Hami.
stepTerms.optionalCommunicationsLabel: I agree to receive personalized mental wellness information and program suggestions via email, SMS, or notifications. Personalized information is analyzed as described in our Privacy Policy for program purposes.
stepTerms.optionalMarketingLabel: I accept the transfer of data for marketing and analysis to Google and Meta.
stepTerms.infoNoteLine1: You can revoke your consent at any time for the future.
stepTerms.infoNoteLine2: Please note: If you withdraw your consent for the processing of personal and health data for use in the app, you will no longer have access to Hami.
stepTerms.infoNoteLine3: To withdraw this consent, use the delete account option in Profile > Data & Security, or email support@hami.example.com.

stepUserInfo.title: Your Details
stepUserInfo.description: Tell us a bit about yourself.

errors.emailOrPhoneRequired: Email or phone number is required.
errors.invalidEmailOrPhone: Please enter a valid email or phone number.
errors.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.
errors.confirmPasswordMinLength: Confirm password must be at least 6 characters.

stepVerification.title: Account Verification
stepVerification.descriptionEmail: A verification code has been sent to {emailOrPhone}. Please enter it below.
stepVerification.descriptionPhone: A verification code has been sent to {emailOrPhone}. Please enter it below.
stepVerification.descriptionGeneric: Please enter the verification code sent to your email or phone.

toast.pasteErrorInvalid: Pasted text is not a valid OTP code.
toast.pasteErrorFailed: Could not read from clipboard. Please type the code manually.
toast.pasteIncompleteDescription: Pasted {count} digits. Please complete the 5-digit code.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content1: These are the main terms for using the Hami application.
introduction.content2: By using the app, you agree to these terms.

services.title: 2. Our Services
services.content1: Hami offers AI insights, journaling, and specialist suggestions.
services.disclaimer: This app is not a substitute for professional medical advice.

introduction.title: 1. Purpose of Data Processing
introduction.content1: To provide you with personalized mental wellness information and program suggestions, we need to process certain data you provide.
introduction.content2: This includes your journal entries, mood inputs, and other interactions with the app.

services.title: 2. Communication Channels
services.content1: If you consent, we may contact you via:
services.disclaimer: You can manage your communication preferences in the app settings at any time.

introduction.title: 1. Data Transfer for Marketing & Analytics
introduction.content1: To improve our services and reach more users who might benefit from Hami, we may share anonymized or aggregated data with third-party services like Google and Meta for marketing and analytics purposes.
introduction.content2: This data does not include your direct journal entries or specific sensitive health information unless explicitly stated and consented to separately.

services.title: 2. What this means
services.content1: This helps us understand usage patterns and make Hami better.
services.disclaimer: Your privacy is important. We aim to share only what is necessary and in a privacy-preserving manner.

landingPage.welcomeMessage: Your intelligent companion for mental well-being. We help you find your path to peace and wellness with AI-driven insights and practical tools.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content1: Welcome to Hami ("Company", "we", "our", "us")! These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of our website and mobile application (collectively, the "Service") offered by Hami.
introduction.content2: By accessing or using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the Service. Please read them carefully.

services.title: 2. Our Services
services.content1: Hami provides a platform for mental wellness, including but not limited to:
services.item1: AI-driven insights based on user-provided data.
services.item2: Tools for daily journaling and mood tracking.
services.item3: Suggestions for relevant specialists based on user needs.
services.disclaimer: Our Service is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.content1: When you create an account with us, you must provide us with information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your account on our Service.
userAccounts.content2: You are responsible for safeguarding the password that you use to access the Service and for any activities or actions under your password, whether your password is with our Service or a third-party service. You agree not to disclose your password to any third party. You must notify us immediately upon becoming aware of any breach of security or unauthorized use of your account.

userContent.title: 4. User Content
userContent.content1: Our Service may allow you to post, link, store, share and otherwise make available certain information, text, graphics, videos, or other material ("Content"). You are responsible for the Content that you post to the Service, including its legality, reliability, and appropriateness.

privacyPolicy.title: 5. Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content1: Our Privacy Policy describes how we handle the information you provide to us when you use our Services. You understand that through your use of the Services you consent to the collection and use (as set forth in the Privacy Policy) of this information. Please review our

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.content1: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease.

disclaimerOfWarranties.title: 7. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimerOfWarranties.content1: The Service is provided on an "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" basis. The Service is provided without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including, but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, non-infringement or course of performance.

limitationOfLiability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content1: In no event shall Hami, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of or inability to access or use the Service.

changesToTerms.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.content1: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material we will try to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion. By continuing to access or use our Service after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

contactInformation.title: 10. Contact Us
contactInformation.content1: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at: support@hami.example.com

questionnairesPage.title: Professional Questionnaires
questionnairesPage.description: Answer these questionnaires to get more accurate insights.
questionnairesPage.beckDescription: A tool to measure the severity of depression.
questionnairesPage.gad7Description: A tool for screening and measuring the severity of generalized anxiety disorder.

connectPage.title: Connect to Another Account
connectPage.description: Share your information with a parent, therapist, or school counselor.

sharingConnections.noConnectionsYet: You haven't connected with anyone yet.
